notes:
This dataset includes an [OpenStreetMap](http://www.openstreetmap.org) extracts for buildings in Haiti. Also see the [Haiti OpenStreetMap extract, Roads](https://data.hdx.rwlabs.org/dataset/haiti-openstreetmap-extract-roads) and [Haiti OpenStreetMap extract, POIs](https://data.hdx.rwlabs.org/dataset/haiti-openstreetmap-extract-pois) datasets on HDX.

The shapefiles include all building features in the OpenStreetMap database for Haiti, including the following tags:

- [building=*](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:building)
- [building:levels=*](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:building:levels)
- [building:material=*](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:building:material)

See the [Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team](http://hotosm.org/) website for more information on the response.
